text:
="preserve">Giorgio Morales (26 March 1932 – 29 November 2020) was an Italian politician and activist. He was Mayor of Florence from 2 October 1989 to 24 April 1995. He was a member of both Socialist and Forza Italia. Morales was born in La Spezia, Italy.
Morales died on 29 November 2020 from pneumonia-related problems in Florence, aged 88.
